thread.title: Cohen & Grigsby Director Appointed Chair of St. Matthew's House Board of Directors

author: cnbc.com
title: Cohen & Grigsby Director Appointed Chair of St. Matthew's House Board of Directors

organizations.name: executive council of the trial lawyers section

text:
NAPLES, Fla., March 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Cohen & Grigsby is pleased to announce the appointment of Rachael S. Loukonen , a director in the firm's Naples office, to chair of the Board of Directors of St. Matthew's House, a 501(c)3 organization that fights homelessness, hunger, substance abuse and poverty in Southwest Florida.
"It is a humbling honor to be named chair of the board for an organization that does so much to benefit our community," said Ms. Loukonen. "Chuck Cohen was instrumental in supporting my work with St. Matthew's House, and I am grateful for his professional mentorship."
Ms. Loukonen is board certified by the Florida Bar in business litigation and is a member of the Executive Council of the Trial Lawyers Section of the Florida Bar. She focuses her practice on litigation matters involving contracts, property, construction, employment and corporate issues.
"We are excited about Rachael Loukonen becoming our board chair," said Vann Ellison, president and CEO of St. Matthew's House. "She has served with distinction as the vice chair to advance our mission, and we are delighted to work with her to build a better future for the hurting and vulnerable in our community."
Prior to her appointment, Ms. Loukonen served as chair of the St. Matthew's House Board of Trustees.
For more information about Cohen & Grigsby, please visit cohenlaw.com .
ABOUT COHEN & GRIGSBY
Since 1981, Cohen & Grigsby, P.C. and its attorneys have provided sound legal advice and solutions to clients that seek to maximize their potential in a constantly changing global marketplace. Comprised of more than 140 lawyers, Cohen & Grigsby maintains offices in Pittsburgh, PA and Naples, Fla. The firm's practice areas include Business Services, Labor & Employment, Immigration/International Business, Intellectual Property, Real Estate & Public Finance, Litigation, Employee Benefits & Executive Compensation, Estates & Trusts, Bankruptcy & Creditors Rights, and Public Affairs. Cohen & Grigsby represents private and publicly held businesses, nonprofits, multinational corporations, individuals and emerging businesses across a full spectrum of industries. Our lawyers maintain an unwavering commitment to customer service that ensures a productive partnership. For more information, visit cohenlaw.com .
